articles.title: Asia shares rise on supportive Fed as Biden unveils new stimulus - Reuters
articles.description: Asian shares rose in early trade on Thursday after the U.S. Federal Reserve said it was too early to consider rolling back emergency support for the economy, and as U.S. President Joe Biden unveiled plans for a $1.8 trillion stimulus package.

articles.title: Returning Filipinos included in India travel ban; vaccine shipment faces delay - CNN Philippines
articles.description: Filipinos hoping to return home from India will be also be barred from entering the Philippines during the travel ban imposed amid the ongoing COVID-19 surge in the South Asian country, officials said on Wednesday.
